thread.title: Disney Doodle: Fauna Visits Main Street Bakery
thread.title_full: Disney Doodle: Fauna Visits Main Street Bakery

author: Jennifer Fickley-Baker
title: Disney Doodle: Fauna Visits Main Street Bakery
text:
This week’s Disney Doodle focuses on Fauna, one of the good fairies in “ Sleeping Beauty .” 
In the film, the fairies Flora, Fauna and Merriweather, use their magic in only cases of emergencies – including birthday cake prep for Aurora (aka Sleeping Beauty). One of Fauna’s contributions is using her magic for cake baking, which inspired artist Ashley Taylor to envision her heading to Main Street Bakery if she had the chance to visit a Disney park .
“My favorite part of this illustration is the iconic Sleeping Beauty cake! While Fauna might not be the best baker, her cakes are fun to look at!,” she said “I can see her creating something special for the Main Street Bakery’s window display!”
